name: marker
summary: The `<marker>` element defines the graphic that is to be used for drawing arrowheads or polymarkers on a given path, line, polyline or polygon element.

markerHeight.name: markerHeight
markerHeight.summary: The `markerHeight` attribute represents the height of the viewport into which the marker is to be fitted when it is rendered according to the viewBox and preserveAspectRatio attributes.

markerUnits.name: markerUnits
markerUnits.summary: The `markerUnits` attribute defines the coordinate system for the markerWidth and markerHeight attributes and the contents of the marker.

markerWidth.name: markerWidth
markerWidth.summary: The `markerWidth` attribute represents the width of the viewport into which the marker is to be fitted when it is rendered according to the viewBox and preserveAspectRatio attributes.

orient.name: orient
orient.summary: The `orient` attribute indicates how a marker is rotated when it is placed at its position on the shape.

preserveAspectRatio.name: preserveAspectRatio
preserveAspectRatio.summary: The `preserveAspectRatio` attribute indicates how an element with a viewBox providing a given aspect ratio must fit into a viewport with a different aspect ratio.

refX.name: refX
refX.summary: The `refX` attribute defines the x coordinate of an element's reference point.

refY.name: refY
refY.summary: The `refY` attribute defines the y coordinate of an element's reference point.

viewBox.name: viewBox
viewBox.summary: The `viewBox` attribute defines the position and dimension, in user space, of an SVG viewport.
